snippet.title: Basureroes: Invasion (Full trailer)
snippet.description:
“Basureroes: Invasion” is a 2D platform game with retro aesthetics in which a group of heroes with different abilities must save the world from an alien invasion. Run, jump and fight your way through more than twenty levels full of danger and epic boss fights.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1955850/Basureroes_Invasion/
